name: dev-cicd-webhooks
description: Webhook server for GitLab CI/CD triggers

scripts.start:bg: nohup node server.js > logs/server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .server.pid && echo 'Server started in background. PID saved to .server.pid'
scripts.stop: if [ -f .server.pid ]; then kill $(cat .server.pid) && rm .server.pid && echo 'Server stopped'; else echo 'No server PID file found'; fi
